version_description:
3.7.4
- Åtgärdar ett problem som kunde göra att det tog ca 60 sekunder att hämta den första datan efter uppstart

3.7.0
iPhone/iPad
- Uppdateringar för iOS9
- Ny inloggning med stöd för att registrera/logga in via Facebook & Twitter
- En helt ny sök! 
Vi har nu lagt in stöd för att söka på butiker samtidigt som vi har gjort om layouten lite för att den ska bli ännu smidigare att använda
Söken sparar och presenterar dessutom sökhistorik!

Apple Watch
- Appen kräver numera watchOS 2
- Lite förändrad navigering för att snabbare ta sig runt i appen
- Uppdaterad design
- Kan numera även ta bort en bevakning genom att trycka hårt på skärmen

- Svep över en rad i sökhistoriken för att ta bort den
- När man tryckte "bakåt" på vissa skärmar kunde appen låsa sig i flera sekunder, detta problem är nu löst
- Ett mängd mindre buggfixar

Appen är nu uppdaterad med stöd för 3D Touch överallt! (för de med en iPhone 6S eller 7)
Tryck lite hårdare på en produkt, oavsett om det är i en sökning eller i en kategori, för att då få en preview av produktsidan.
Om du sveper uppåt i detta läget får du även snabblänkar för jämföra, bevaka, lägga i en lista eller dela produkten

Om du däremot trycker lite hårdare på produktbilden så får du upp bildgalleriet och kan svepa fram och tillbaka mellan bilderna utan att först behöva gå in på produktsidan ens!

Added price error reporting
Minor bug fixes

The filter is now taking up the whole screen.
We’re showing the number of reviews on products and stores.
We’re also showing the rating in numbers and not only as stars.
Fixed some minor but really annoying layout issues and bugs.

- Fixed a crash in price history when the product didn't have any history.
- We honestly have no idea why and when but for some users the filter sometimes crashes. Anyway, this should fix it.
- Support for Denmark

- We honestly have no idea why and when but for some users the filter sometimes crashes. Anyway, this should fix it.
- Support for Denmark

Prices are red,
violets are blue,
we redesigned the product price listing,
and fixed some bugs for you.

Did you know we have an iPad app? We have an iPad app! And we have fixed some really weird issues with it.

We’re aware that some of you have problems with logging in. We’re working on it and have fixed some issues in this version.

Did I forgot something?
Oh yeah, we’re using five stars instead of ten now so that’s cool.

Until next time, price compare and prosper.

The filter is now taking up the whole screen.
We’re showing the number of reviews on products and stores.
We’re also showing the rating in numbers and not only as stars.
Fixed some minor but really annoying layout issues and bugs.

Bugfixes
Bugfixes
Bugfixes

New:
- You can now create an alert that only notifies you when the product is in stock

Fixed:
- Fix an issue where you couldn't remove a store rating threshold on an alert
- We're handling empty content a lot better
- Fix a crash that sometimes happened when you removed items from compare
- The compare bubble doesn't disappear if you add an already existing item to it
- Some other minor layout fixes

New:
- You can now create an alert that only notifies you when the product is in stock

Fixed:
- Fix an issue where you couldn't remove a store rating threshold on an alert
- We're handling empty content a lot better
- Fix a crash that sometimes happened when you removed items from compare
- The compare bubble doesn't disappear if you add an already existing item to it
- Some other minor layout fixes

New:
- You can now create an alert that only notifies you when the product is in stock

Fixed:
- Fix an issue where you couldn't remove a store rating threshold on an alert
- We're handling empty content a lot better
- Fix a crash that sometimes happened when you removed items from compare
- The compare bubble doesn't disappear if you add an already existing item to it
- Some other minor layout fixes

- Fixed a crash in price history when the product didn't have any history.
- We honestly have no idea why and when but for some users the filter sometimes crashes. Anyway, this should fix it.
- Support for Denmark

- Fixed an issue where the app sometimes said you successfully logged in when you didn't. We do like a positive mindset but lying is a bad thing.
- Fixed some weird layout issues with the filter

Bugfixes in the search component and other more general bugfixes
Bugfixes in the search component and other more general bugfixes
Bugfixes in the search component and other more general bugfixes

New:
- We are proud to announce that we now support dark mode!
- We now show which products are in a campaign by displaying a badge in the product and price lists so that they are easy to identify!

Fixed:
- Fixed a couple of crashes that could occur when deleting and updating alerts and items in lists
- Fixed a layout issue that could happen when showing the options to report price errors
- Fixed an issue where the options when adding items to a list didn't show up properly

New:
- We are proud to announce that we now support dark mode!
- We now show which products are in a campaign by displaying a badge in the product and price lists so that they are easy to identify!

Fixed:
- Fixed a couple of crashes that could occur when deleting and updating alerts and items in lists
- Fixed a layout issue that could happen when showing the options to report price errors
- Fixed an issue where the options when adding items to a list didn't show up properly

New:
- We are proud to announce that we now support dark mode!
- We now show which products are in a campaign by displaying a badge in the product and price lists so that they are easy to identify!

Fixed:
- Fixed a couple of crashes that could occur when deleting and updating alerts and items in lists
- Fixed a layout issue that could happen when showing the options to report price errors
- Fixed an issue where the options when adding items to a list didn't show up properly

New: 
We have made some more improvements to the app in dark mode, including a fix for the category icons and the store logos.

Fixed:
- Fixed an issue where you were unable to login with Facebook on iOS 13
- Fixed an issue where the app would reload when becoming active if the search tab was selected
- Fixed some performance issues when scrolling through the list of products
- Fixed an issue in related products where they didn't load properly
- Fixed some layout issues where the item separators could disappear in our lists of products
- Fixed a crash when navigating expert reviews
- Fixed a crash in related products

New: 
We have made some more improvements to the app in dark mode, including a fix for the category icons and the store logos.

- Fixed an issue where you were unable to login with Facebook on iOS 13
- Fixed an issue where the app would reload when becoming active if the search tab was selected
- Fixed some performance issues when scrolling through the list of products
- Fixed an issue in related products where they didn't load properly
- Fixed some layout issues where the item separators could disappear in our lists of products
